channel.title: Fireworks ruined :(
channel.description:
The new years evening with fireworks has been ruined. In holland we use to spend tons of money on fireworks because we just like it lol. But this year it was no fun anymore, there was too much fog. If you have good eyes you're lucky if you can see 5 meter in the distance. In the city where I live you couldn't see 1 meter in the distance.
Fireworks + Fog = [img]http://hengeloosnieuws.nl/IMG_5163.JPG[/img] [img]http://hengeloosnieuws.nl/IMG_5164.JPG[/img] [img]http://hengeloosnieuws.nl/IMG_5165.JPG[/img] [img]http://hengeloosnieuws.nl/IMG_5166.JPG[/img] [img]http://hengeloosnieuws.nl/IMG_5167.JPG[/img] [img]http://hengeloosnieuws.nl/IMG_5168.JPG[/img] [img]http://hengeloosnieuws.nl/IMG_5169.JPG[/img] Note: I didn't make the pictures, they're from the news.

@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Stfu with the ‘aussie r better’ ‘holland new racE???’.

Just not here.

Edit: The pics are not even made in the city where I live, the city where I live (groningen) was worse, couldn’t see 1 meter in the distance.

item.title: Fireworks ruined :(
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Iamadam:

Just admit that Australia > *

Australia > *

[quote=“eVokki`, post:24, topic:169823”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=229615.msg1969332#msg1969332 date=1199236560]

[quote author=eVokki` link=topic=229615.msg1969329#msg1969329 date=1199236509]

Dutch people, American people. It’s just a difference of less ignorance and more lenient drug laws.

If I was either I would glady kill myself.

I would love to see what Mr.Moparisthebest would say about that.
[/quote]something ignorant no doubt

I would like to remind you that we are talking about dutch people

The dutch are bad but don’t get started on the aussies!!!

i fkn dare ya

Aussies these days with their attitudes, in the days of the British empire we would just populate a little country with convicts and send them there.
[/quote]yeah, these days you are all moving over here…

Only to see the experience you convicts have been through since the population of Australian started ^.^[/quote]
No, they come to Australia because it’s a better country. Lower taxes, better government, no stupid queen, and wildlife like kangaroos.
Put it this way: How many english people know loads about Australian wildlife (kangaroos, koalas, platypus’ etc)?
How many Australians bother learning about english stuff? :rolleyes:

EDIT: had to fix a typo.

Read full topic

item.title: Fireworks ruined :(
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“eVokki`, post:5, topic:169823”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=229615.msg1968889#msg1968889 date=1199220560]

The fog sucked, I know.
[/quote]It sucked bad, but on some way it was funny.
I saw cars crashing, people on bikes crashing etc.
But wasted cash on fireworks ffs

Oh yes, I always find people in cars crashing at what ever speed they are driving at, possibly causing death a perfectly comical moment also.
[/end sarcasm][/quote]
The cars crashing I saw wasn’t hard like you see on the news alot.
It was more like cars driving 1 km per hour and just slowly driving into someone’s house.

[quote=“sppt, post:17, topic:169823”]we didn’t have any real thick, annoying fog here in noord brabant.
most of the fog came from our fireworks :P[/quote]
Fog didn’t came from the fireworks.
It was because of the mix of fog and herb steam.
Anyways, thread can be locked.
Frank posted in it.
Waits…

Read full topic
